application-details.help: Location in memory where the application information can be read.

bootloader-details.help: Location in memory where the bootloader information can be read.

storage-address.help: When using address based storage (FlashIAP, Block Device), this is the starting address.

storage-locations.help: Number of equally sized locations the storage space should be split into.

storage-page.help: Smallest write unit on storage device. Used for compile time check of download/write buffers.

firmware-header-version.help: Version of the firmware metadata header.

http-resume-attempt-test-messages-enable.help: Print messages indicating HTTP-resume actions for QA/test purposes.

http-resume-fragments-per-burst.help: Number of fragments to be requested per HTTP GET from server.

http-resume-exponentiation-factor.help: Multiplier for consecutive resume-attempt delay periods.

http-resume-initial-delay-secs.help: Initial delay for HTTP-resume actions after which period resume goes active.

http-resume-maximum-delay-secs.help: Maximum delay for HTTP-resume actions after which period resume goes active.

http-resume-maximum-download-time-secs.help: Period for HTTP-resume actions after which resume gives up and terminates.
